title.rendered: “IDF Launches Comprehensive Strikes on Hezbollah Targets Across Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF has completed a wave of wide-scale attacks in Lebanese territory, including targets associated with the Radwan force; military buildings, combat weapon systems and terror infrastructures were targeted in several areas across Lebanon.

A short while ago, combat aircraft attacked a series of targets belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the areas of Jebel Al Birag’, Huneh, Dunin, Adshit and Al-Tsuana.

Among the targets attacked were military buildings, combat weapon systems, and terror infrastructures used by members of the organization. Some targets are associated with the Radwan force.
